title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown instead of the group dialog.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting a dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog should be displayed. The user should be able to define a group, even when the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is shown and the user is able to define a group, even when the dataset is not defined.
